game.name: Distance
game.description: 3D action RPG featuring procedurally generated levels, fast-paced enemy combat encounters and story elements in between levels.
abouts: Programming, design, 3D modeling, animation, music & SFX.
Dungeon levels are procedurally generated at runtime, making them unique in every playthrough.
Combat system, weapon and skill upgrades.
Varied enemy AI types and boss encounters.
